Title: Relates to the application for registration of manufacturers, dealers, repairmen and others
Summary: Requires a certification from the municipality where the business is to be conducted indicating that the business is in compliance with applicable zoning and planning regulations, fire regulations and zoning codes to be included in the application for registration of manufacturers, dealers, repairmen and others.
LawCode: Amd ยง415, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the application for registration of manufacturers, dealers, repairmen and others
